title: The European Market Brief 6: Navigating Europe’s Crypto Landscape
description: This episode of The European Market Brief covers the rise of crypto futures and options, institutional interest in crypto, recent price movements in Bitcoin and Ethereum, regulatory developments in the US and Europe, as well as the impact of AI on the crypto space.

title: Tesla’s Bitcoin Sale: Missed Billions as Crypto Hits $123K
description: Tesla invested $1.5 billion in Bitcoin in 2021, boosting its value, but sold 75% in 2022 at $20,000 per coin amid a market low, netting $936 million. This missed billions in gains as Bitcoin surged to $123,000. The saga highlights the risks of poor market timing in volatile crypto assets.
